EmailTemplate.name: Skylight
EmailTemplate.subject: Skylight
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We apologize for any inconvenience. Although the card is issued by our Bank, we do not house any customer accounts so there is no way we can access any account information. Please use the following contact information to direct your inquiry;
Skylight
Phone: 1-800-686-3363
Email: contact@skylight.net
Alternatively, if you are unable to make contact with a live representative, please call 1-877-541-2634. A Direct Banker will be happy to transfer you to an actual representative.
